text: Susan (from Intel) email this morning asking for a cap before she flies out to MN tmrw afternoon. I stopped by office and grabbed #24. Have emailed her with proposed meet-up tmrw on way to airport. Please follow-up here if we don't want to hand over cap.
Would it be better for her to grab one from the demo?
Also for research purposes here is something anecdotal; my sister is a "cork dork" and spent $1400 on wine rack "furniture" + $350 for a 40 bottle wine fridge. Total bottle capacity is 350
Is there any way for her to turn it on? I'm fine if she brings one with her. Let's get clarity on the video needs and coordinate when her meeting is on Tuesday.
I bet the client is Target.
Let me know if there is anything I can help with.
I'll forward her email to the team. In it, she mentioned the shot selections I mentioned to Shashi worked great and that she didn't need a working cap. Email coming soon.
Let's stick with the original video plan then.
